nodes.text: We should act in a manner that is independent of the President's direction..
they have to follow the President's di-rection.
we  are not sent here by our people to let  the President or the White House or  any party control us or dictate to us.
If the President did not elect us and our people did not send us to be controlled by any party we should act in a manner that is independent of the President's direction.
This is  a separate branch of Government. No  President elects any Member of this  body. The President is just the Chief  Executive of the land
